title: Ep69: Royal Norfolk Regiment - The Phoney War
itunes:title: Ep69: Royal Norfolk Regiment - The Phoney War
itunes:subtitle: Pete and Gary continue their fascinating series following the men of the Royal Norfolk Regiment in the Second World War. In this episode they discuss the 'Phoney War' of late-1939. Presenters: Peter Hart and Gary Bain Publisher: Mat McLachlan...
description:
Pete and Gary continue their fascinating series following the men of the Royal Norfolk Regiment in the Second World War. In this episode they discuss the 'Phoney War' of late-1939.

Presenters: Peter Hart and Gary Bain Publisher: Mat McLachlan Producer: Jess Stebnicki

For more great history content, visit www.LivingHistoryTV.com, or subscribe to our YouTube channel at www.youtube.com/c/LivingHistoryTV

Pete & Gary's Military History is a Living History production.

Become a member at https://plus.acast.com/s/pete-and-garys-military-history.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
